attributes.action: prevent the closure of Michaelchurch Escley Primary School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are totally against the closure of Micaechurch Escley Primary school, Herefordshire, in order that it be merged with Peterchurch Primary School. 
We urge the authorities to consider what a fantastic school Michaelchurch is, and to consider how it will affect pupils, teachers, parents and the community. 
We are a rural community, our schools are cornerstones, and we are asking for respect for our choice, respect for our schools and way of life.

If you close Michaelchurch, you close a part of our community, destroy a fantastic school - with brilliant Ofsted reports and reputation. 

We do not agree with the proposals at all!
